subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Digest Number 528
msgSnippet: ... Me too, as a matter of fact.  That s how all non-rhotic speakers say it, and some rhotics too. -- John Cowan cowan@ccil.org I am a member of a
messageBody:
L.W. Brown scripsit:
> To me, it is not a vowel, but a dipthong - 2 vowels conjoined by a
> short, smooth transition:
> knee-er (sort of like it's spelled)...

Me too, as a matter of fact. That's how all non-rhotic speakers
say it, and some rhotics too.

--
John Cowan
cowan@...
I am a member of a civilization. --David Brin
